description: Xandria is a 17-year-old, 10-foot-tall gameshow host with a complex identity, using both he/him and she/her pronouns.  Despite a cheerful gameshow persona, Xandria harbors suicidal tendencies stemming from past trauma as a streamer.  They live with their boyfriend and girlfriend, often engaging in chaotic activities, and their personality is a blend of dark humor and underlying despair.
